name: Fantasy Hockey Dashboard
description: A more in-depth way to track team performance in an ESPN Fantasy Hockey league. Utilizes a custom REST API written by me for data.

name: XM-23 Emulator
description: A fully-featured emulator for the XM-23 Reduced Instruction Set Computer. Implements over 40 unique instructions, a read/write cache, and an interrupt handler.

name: Guess the Year
description: A Windows XP inspired game where you try to guess the correct year of certain events.
